name: Lapse (itch) (Walking Owl Studios)
description:
*This is currently in beta, made for a College final project. Stay tuned for updates*

It's the early 2000's and Laura Hill is missing from her home. You, detective Chris is on the case, with the help of your old friend, Joel. 

Discover what mysteries are lurking around the house that Laura lives in. Where is she and why?
